body.p: Born in Newington, Orange County, Virginia in 1795. Enlisted in the Army at Camp Seneca, Forest Hills, Queens, New York. Fought at the Battle of Lake Erie, September 10, 1813, near Put-In-Bay, Ohio under Commodore Perry. Fought at the battle of Moravian Town, Canada West on October 5, 1813. studied medicine at University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, in 1818. Became an ophthalmologist, performing cataract surgery in Maysville, Mason County, Kentucky. Moved to Cincinnati in 1841 and helped establish the second regular hospital in Cincinnati. He became the Chair of the Cincinnati College of Medicine. William Taliaferro died on March 22, 1871 in Cincinnati, Ohio.
